sen.j: 特記事項
sen.e: Special notice
Special notice
Remarks

sen.j: 南区（みなみく）は、京都市を構成する11区のひとつである。
sen.e: Minami Ward is one of the eleven wards in Kyoto City.
Minami Ward is one of the eleven wards in Kyoto City.
Minami Ward is one of the eleven wards that constitute Kyoto City.

sen.j: 河川：鴨川 (淀川水系)、桂川 (淀川水系)、西高瀬川
sen.e: Rivers: Kamo-gawa River, Katsura-gawa River, and Nishitakase-gawa River
sen.cmt: 原文には、「鴨川 (淀川水系)」、 「桂川 (淀川水系)」 とありますが、「(淀川水系)」はリンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「鴨川」、「桂川」だけとなっており、本来はこちらの用語だけを使用していると思われますので、こちらだけを訳出しました。
sen.e: Rivers: Kamo-gawa River, Katsura-gawa River, and Nishitakase-gawa River
Rivers: Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system), Katsura-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system), and Nishitakase-gawa River
sen.cmt: (淀川水系) 追加しました。

sen.j: 1889年（明治22年） - 現在の南区の範囲に市町村制施行で以下の6村が誕生
sen.e: 1889: By enacting the Shisei Chosonsei (City System and Town and Village System Law), the six villages described below were established in the area of the present Minami Ward.
sen.cmt: 「市町村制」は正式な「市制・町村制」として訳してます。
sen.e: 1889: The six villages described below were established in the area of the present Minami Ward, through the Shisei Chosonsei (City System and Town and Village System Law).
1889: The six villages described below were established in the area of the present Minami Ward, through the Shisei Chosonsei (City System and Town and Village System Law).

sen.j: 1918年（大正7年） - 葛野郡大内村・七条村と、紀伊郡東九条村・上鳥羽村の一部（十条通以北）が下京区に編入
sen.e: 1918: Shimogyo Ward absorbed Ouchi-mura and Shichijo-mura in Kadono-gun and part of Higashikujo-mura and Kamitoba-mura to the north of Jujo-dori Street in Ki-gun.
1918: Shimogyo Ward absorbed Ouchi-mura and Shichijo-mura in Kadono-gun and part of Higashikujo-mura and Kamitoba-mura to the north of Jujo-dori Street in Ki-gun.
1918: Shimogyo Ward absorbed Ouchi-mura and Shichijo-mura in Kadono-gun and part of Higashikujo-mura and Kamitoba-mura to the north of Jujo-dori Street in Kii-gun.

sen.j: 1931年（昭和6年） - 紀伊郡吉祥院村・上鳥羽村が下京区に編入
sen.e: 1931: Shimogyo Ward absorbed Kisshoin-mura and Kamitoba-mura in Ki-gun.
1931: Shimogyo Ward absorbed Kisshoin-mura and Kamitoba-mura in Ki-gun.
1931: Shimogyo Ward absorbed Kisshoin-mura and Kamitoba-mura in Kii-gun.

sen.j: 1955年（昭和30年） - 9月1日 下京区から分区して誕生
sen.e: 1955: On September 1, Minami Ward was created from Shimogyo Ward.
1955: On September 1, Minami Ward was created from Shimogyo Ward.
1955: On September 1, Minami Ward was created from Shimogyo Ward.

sen.j: 1959年（昭和34年） - 11月1日 乙訓郡久世村を編入
sen.e: 1959: On November 1, Minami Ward absorbed Kuze-mura, Otokuni-gun.
1959: On November 1, Minami Ward absorbed Kuze-mura, Otokuni-gun.
1959: On November 1, Minami Ward absorbed Kuze-mura, Otokuni-gun.

sen.j: （至京都駅）←東寺駅 - 十条駅 (近鉄)→（至大和西大寺駅）
sen.e: Toji Station (from/to Kyoto Station), Jujo Station (from/to Yamato-Saidaiji Station)
sen.cmt: 原文には、「十条駅 (近鉄)」 とありますが、「(近鉄)」はリンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「十条駅」だけとなっており、本来はこちらの用語だけを使用していると思われますので、こちらだけを訳出しました。
sen.e: Toji Station (from/to Kyoto Station), Jujo Station (from/to Yamato-Saidaiji Station)

sen.e: Karasuma Line of the Kyoto City Subway
the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway
sen.cmt: 他と統一しました。"Karasuma Line"→"the Karasuma Line"に変更しました。

sen.j: 下京区から分区した名残で、南区の担当集配郵便局が、下京区にある京都中央郵便局（南区北端部と至近）となっている。
sen.e: Collection and delivery in Minami Ward is operated by Kyoto Central Post Office (located near the northern edge of Minami Ward) in Shimogyo Ward due to the history of Minami Ward's separation from Shimogyo Ward.

Collection and delivery in Minami Ward is operated by Kyoto Central Post Office (located near the northern edge of Minami Ward) in Shimogyo Ward due to the Minami Ward's history of separation from Shimogyo Ward.

Collection and delivery in Minami Ward is operated by Kyoto Central Post Office (located near the northern edge of Minami Ward) in Shimogyo Ward due to the Minami Ward's history of separation from Shimogyo Ward.

sen.j: ただし、1968年に導入された郵便番号では下京区と区別するため「601」となり、1998年の7桁化時には「601-8XXX」となった。
sen.e: When the ZIP code system was introduced 1968, however, Minami Ward was assigned the ZIP code '601' to distinguish the ward with Shimogyo Ward; when the seven digits of the ZIP code system was introduced in 1998, the ward's ZIP code changed to '601-xxxx.'

When the ZIP code system was introduced 1968, however, Minami Ward was assigned the ZIP code '601' to distinguish the ward from Shimogyo Ward; when the seven digit ZIP code system was introduced in 1998, the ward's ZIP code changed to '601-xxxx.'

When the ZIP code system was introduced 1968, however, Minami Ward was assigned the ZIP code '601' to distinguish the ward from Shimogyo Ward; when the seven digit ZIP code system was introduced in 1998, the ward's ZIP code changed to '601-xxxx.'

sen.j: なお、「601-XXXX」は京都市北部山間部（旧京北町を含む、左京区久多を除く）や伏見区醍醐地区、宇治市笠取地区、南丹市美山町 (京都府)でも使われている。
sen.e: The ZIP code '601-xxxx' is also assigned to the mountainous areas (including former Keihoku-cho, but excluding Kuta in Sakyo Ward) in the north of Kyoto City, the Daigo area in Fushimi Ward, the Kasatori area in Uji City, and Miyama-cho in Nantan City.
sen.cmt: 原文には、「美山町 (京都府)」 とありますが、(京都府)はリンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「美山町」だけとなっており、本来はこちらの用語だけを使用していると思われますので、こちらだけを訳出しました。
sen.e: The ZIP code '601-xxxx' is also assigned to the mountainous areas (including former Keihoku-cho, but excluding Kuta in Sakyo Ward) in the north of Kyoto City, the Daigo area in Fushimi Ward, the Kasatori area in Uji City, and Miyama-cho in Nantan City.

The ZIP code '601-xxxx' is also assigned to the mountainous areas (including former Keihoku-cho, but excluding Kuta in Sakyo Ward) in the north of Kyoto City, the Daigo area in Fushimi Ward, the Kasatori area in Uji City, and Miyama-cho (Kyoto Prefecture) in Nantan City.
Kyoto Central Post Office (Shimogyo War): 600-0000, 600-8xxx, 601-0000 and 601-8xxx
Kyoto Central Post Office (Shimogyo War): 600-0000, 600-8xxx, 601-0000 and 601-8xxx
Kyoto Central Post Office (Shimogyo Ward): 600-0000, 600-8xxx, 601-0000 and 601-8xxx
